svg.title: UML Diagram: Class RecordRelation in Context

g.text: UML Diagram: Class RecordRelation in Context

a.title: ― CatalogDetails: A set of information useful for attribution, data discovery, and access.
a.xlink:title: ― CatalogDetails: A set of information useful for attribution, data discovery, and access.

a.title: ― LabelForDisplay: A structured display label. Label provides display content of a fully human readable display for the identification of the object.
a.xlink:title: ― LabelForDisplay: A structured display label. Label provides display content of a fully human readable display for the identification of the object.

a.title: ― Identifier: Identifier for objects requiring short- or long-lasting referencing and management.
a.xlink:title: ― Identifier: Identifier for objects requiring short- or long-lasting referencing and management.

a.title: ― InternationalString: Packaging structure for multilingual versions of the same string content, represented by a set of LanguageString. Only one LanguageString per language/scope type is allowed. Where an element of this type (InternationalString) is repeatable, the expectation is that each repetition contains a differen ...
a.xlink:title: ― InternationalString: Packaging structure for multilingual versions of the same string content, represented by a set of LanguageString. Only one LanguageString per language/scope type is allowed. Where an element of this type (InternationalString) is repeatable, the expectation is that each repetition contains a differen ...

a.title: ― InternationalString: Packaging structure for multilingual versions of the same string content, represented by a set of LanguageString. Only one LanguageString per language/scope type is allowed. Where an element of this type (InternationalString) is repeatable, the expectation is that each repetition contains a differen ...
a.xlink:title: ― InternationalString: Packaging structure for multilingual versions of the same string content, represented by a set of LanguageString. Only one LanguageString per language/scope type is allowed. Where an element of this type (InternationalString) is repeatable, the expectation is that each repetition contains a differen ...

a.title: ― InstanceVariableMap: Key value relationship for two or more logical records where the key is one or more equivalent instance variables and the value is a defined relationship or a relationship to a set value.
a.xlink:title: ― InstanceVariableMap: Key value relationship for two or more logical records where the key is one or more equivalent instance variables and the value is a defined relationship or a relationship to a set value.

a.title: ― Comparison: The minimal pattern for a comparison including a mapping between members.
a.xlink:title: ― Comparison: The minimal pattern for a comparison including a mapping between members.

a.title: ― has: The record relation that defines the relationship and linking requirements between logical records in the data store.
a.xlink:title: ― has: The record relation that defines the relationship and linking requirements between logical records in the data store.
